participant_1.name: Sarah Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Sarah enjoys connecting with others and sharing her love for music.
participant_1.background: I drive a nissan pathfinder. My favourite music is country music. I have short brown hair. I am a convenience store manager. I met taylor swift.

participant_2.name: James Carter
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and reflective, James finds joy in helping others and has a deep appreciation for history.
participant_2.background: I volunteer at a soup kitchen. I like watching war documentaries. I am a retired gym teacher. I was poor growing up. Cheeseburgers are my favorite food.
